snippet.title: City Transport Simulator: Tram - In Early Access on June 20th!
snippet.description:
The wait is over! City Transport Simulator: Tram will be released on June 20, 2024, in Early Access! Visit the Steam page to learn more about the features and reasons for the Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2604480/City_Transport_Simulator_Tram/

👉 VISIT THE WEBSITE ➡️ https://citytransportsimulator.com/
👉 WISHLIST ON STEAM ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2604480/City_Transport_Simulator_Tram/
👉 SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@ViewApp?sub_confirmation=1

SOCIAL LINKS
👉 DISCORD ➡️ https://discord.gg/viewapp-community-1053340211016372285
👉 INSTAGRAM ➡️ https://www.instagram.com/tramsimulation/
👉 FACEBOOK ➡️ https://www.facebook.com/tramsimulator
👉 TIKTOK ➡️ https://www.tiktok.com/@viewapp

City Transport Simulator: Tram - available on June 20, 2024!
Become a tram driver! Get back in the cabin for the ultimate tram experience. Drive modern trams from various cities with physics indistinguishable from reality. Hit the tracks and transport passengers by sticking to the schedule and strategically setting up your own tram routes, choosing from many stations to build a fully functional and effective tram network.

Career Mode
Become the operations manager of the entire tram network in Career Mode! Start with limited resources, establish a brand-new fully customizable tram company, and choose your own tram liveries and logos. Get your passengers to their destinations on time, collect XP to level up and unlock more operational resources. Connect an entire network of tram stations: gradually expand your tram lines, increase your vehicle fleet, and work towards building an extensive, interconnected tram network in the city.

Sandbox Mode
No expectations, no pressure, just a relaxed tram tour. Enjoy the photorealistic graphics and realistic tram physics, day or night. Create tram lines without restrictions and transport your passengers as you see fit. Take your trams on a joyride and run them on schedules: a purely classic tram experience.

Welcome to Tramau
Immerse yourself in our vision of a traffic-friendly city in southern Germany, where the charm of tradition effortlessly merges with innovation. Strategically navigate through various cityscapes and challenging tram routes. Look forward to creating a vibrant, efficient tram network while admiring the city’s skyline, marked by landmarks like a majestic cathedral that stands as a testament to Tramau's rich cultural heritage.
